content.rendered:
Directed By James Gunn.

Written By James Gunn.

Cast Chris Pratt. Chukwudi Iwuji. Bradley Cooper

Language English.

Producer Victoria Alonso. Louis D’Esposito. Kevin Feige. David J. Grant. Simon Hatt. Nikolas Korda. Sara Smith. Lars P. Winther.

Production Marvel Studios. Film New Zealand. Marvel Entertainment.
